Name: Academic
Description: An academic is a person who is engaged in higher education and research. This type typically includes those whose career is in academia and who work as professors and/or researchers in universities and research institutes. It can also include those that have held academic posts such as visiting professorships and research fellowships.

Properties.Name: Academic advisor
Properties.Description: Person or people who have served as advisors (usually for post-graduate-level education) for this person.

Properties.Name: Research areas
Properties.Description: The major research area or areas of this academic.

Properties.Name: Departments
Properties.Description: Departments of colleges or universities this person has been affiliated with, either as an employee of the school, or as through an exchange or other type of posting.
